19956802Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LoggedInActivityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void TestLoggingIn()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sessionManager = new SessionManager();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var afterLogIn = Observable.FromEventPattern<SessionEventArgs>(Di2015NewLine            h => sessionManager.AfterLogin += h,Di2015NewLine            h => sessionManager.AfterLogin -= h)Di2015NewLine            .Select(x => x.EventArgs.UserId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var beforeLogOff = Observable.FromEventPattern<SessionEventArgs>(Di2015NewLine            h => sessionManager.BeforeLogoff += h,Di2015NewLine            h => sessionManager.BeforeLogoff -= h)Di2015NewLine            .Select(x => x.EventArgs.UserId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var loggedIn = afterLogIn.GroupByUntil(Di2015NewLine            userId => userId,Di2015NewLine            login => beforeLogOff.Where(y => y == login.Key));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<IGroupedObservable<int, int>, IObservable<string>> whileLoggedIn = login =>Di2015NewLine            Observable.Using(Di2015NewLine                () => sessionManager.AddSession(new Session(login.Key)),Di2015NewLine                session => Observable.FromEventPattern(Di2015NewLine                    h => session.SomeEvent += h,Di2015NewLine                    h => session.SomeEvent -= h)Di2015NewLine                    .Select(x => "User " + login.Key + " had SomeEvent!")Di2015NewLine                    .TakeUntil(login.LastAsync()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Single non-terminating stream that capturesDi2015NewLine        // all events occuring during any login Di2015NewLine        var loggedInEvents = loggedIn.SelectMany(whileLoggedIn);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        loggedInEvents.Subscribe(Console.WriteLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sessionManager.Login(1);Di2015NewLine        sessionManager.Sessions[1].RaiseSomeEvent();Di2015NewLine        sessionManager.Login(2);Di2015NewLine        sessionManager.Sessions[1].RaiseSomeEvent();Di2015NewLine        sessionManager.Sessions[2].RaiseSomeEvent();Di2015NewLine        sessionManager.Logoff(2);Di2015NewLine        sessionManager.Logoff(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SessionManagerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<SessionEventArgs> temp = AfterLogin;Di2015NewLine        if (temp != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AfterLogin(this, new SessionEventArgs(userId));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Session AddSession(Session session)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sessions.Add(session.UserId, session);Di2015NewLine        return session;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Logoff(int userId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var temp = BeforeLogoff;Di2015NewLine        if (temp != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BeforeLogoff(this, new SessionEventArgs(userId));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Sessions.Remove(userId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Session : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _userId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int UserId { get { return 19962051Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public String EscapeNonASCIIChars(String xml)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(xml.Length);Di2015NewLine    char highSurrogate = '\\0';Di2015NewLine    foreach (char c in xml)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (c < 128)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine        else if (c >= 0xd800 && c <= 0xdbff)Di2015NewLine            highSurrogate = c;Di2015NewLine        else if (c >= 0xdc00 && c <= 0xdfff)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(string.Format("&#x{0:x};", 0x10000 + ((int) (highSurrogate & 0x3ff) << 10 | (c & 0x3ff))));Di2015NewLine        else Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(string.Format("&#x{0:x};", (int) c));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19963046Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplicationExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Runner r = new Runner();Di2015NewLine            r.SplitFile(@"C:\\path\\to\\my\\file.txt");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class RunnerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly string m_delimiter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Runner()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_delimiter = "Finished File";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void SplitFile(string inputFile)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(inputFile);Di2015NewLine                StreamWriter writer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int i = 1;                              // count up for every output   file, auto-numbering from 1Di2015NewLine                string line;                    Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string outputFile = GenerateFileName(inputFile, i);Di2015NewLine                    writer = new StreamWriter(outputFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (line.CompareTo(m_delimiter) == 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            writer.Close();Di2015NewLine                            break;                      // breaking will exit the  while-loop & increment i to build a new output file nameDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                            writer.WriteLine(line);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    i++;Di2015NewLine                } while (line != null);Di2015NewLine                writer.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Error splitting file: " + ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string GenerateFileName(string inputFile, int i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string folder = Path.GetFullPath(inputFile);Di2015NewLine            string fileNameNoExt = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(inputFile);Di2015NewLine            string ext = Path.GetExtension(inputFile);Di2015NewLine            return folder + fileNameNoExt + "." + i.ToString("000") + ext;          //  zero-pads "000"Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19965564Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var hours = 13;Di2015NewLine    for (var items = 16; items < 22; items++)Di2015NewLine        PrintDistribution(items, hours);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void PrintDistribution(int items, int hours)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(string.Format("\\nItems={0}, Hours={1}", items, hours));Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < (items / hours) * hours; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write('X');Di2015NewLine        if ((i + 1) % hours == 0)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var line = new StringBuilder(new string(' ', hours));Di2015NewLine    var remaining = items % hours;Di2015NewLine    var evens = remaining / 2;Di2015NewLine    var odd = remaining - (evens * 2);Di2015NewLine    var seq = BinaryTreeSequence(hours / 2).GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < evens; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        seq.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        line[seq.Current] = 'X';Di2015NewLine        line[hours - seq.Current - 1] = 'X';Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (odd > 0)Di2015NewLine        if (hours % 2 == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            seq.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            line[seq.Current] = 'X';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            line[hours / 2] = 'X';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(line);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<int> BinaryTreeSequence(int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (count > 1)Di2015NewLine        yield return count - 1; Di2015NewLine    if (count > 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var seqQueue = new Queue<Tuple<int, int, int>>();Di2015NewLine    Enqueue(seqQueue, 0, count - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var seqIndex = count - 2; seqIndex > 0; seqIndex--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var moreNeeded = seqQueue.Count < seqIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var seq = seqQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        yield return seq.Item1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (moreNeeded)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Enqueue(seqQueue, seq.Item1, seq.Item3);Di2015NewLine            Enqueue(seqQueue, seq.Item2, seq.Item1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void Enqueue(Queue<Tuple<int, int, int>> q, int min, int max)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var midPoint = (min + max) / 2;Di2015NewLine    if (midPoint != min && midPoint != max)Di2015NewLine        q.Enqueue(Tuple.Create(midPoint, min, max));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19966025Di2015UniqueSeparator // Assuming you have a NodeWrapper structure that wraps the Round objectsDi2015NewLine public IList<NodeWrapper> BuildTrees(List<Round> list)Di2015NewLine {         Di2015NewLine     Dictionary<Round, NodeWrapper> map = new Dictionary<Round, NodeWrapper>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     List<NodeWrapper> roots = new List<NodeWrapper>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // order list and iterate throughDi2015NewLine     foreach(Round node in list.OrderBy(r => r.Depth))Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        NodeWrapper wrapper = new NodeWrapper(node);Di2015NewLine        if(node.Depth == 0) {Di2015NewLine            roots.Add(wrapper);                Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            var parentWrapper = map[node.Parent];Di2015NewLine            parrentWrapper.AddChild(wrapper);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        map.Add(node, wrapper);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     return roots;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19970769Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic TreeNode BuildTree(IEnumerable<Input> inputs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TreeNode rootNode = null;Di2015NewLine    // Build a dictionary to store each input and its nodeDi2015NewLine    var dict = inputs.ToDictionary(Di2015NewLine        input => input.Id,Di2015NewLine        input => new { Input = input, Node = new TreeNode(input.Id.ToString()) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Iterate through the nodes and build relationship among themDi2015NewLine    foreach(var value in dict.Values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var input = value.Input;Di2015NewLine        if(input.ParentId != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dict[(int)input.ParentId].Node.Nodes.Add(value.Node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rootNode = value.Node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return rootNode;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19974596Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom
19974596Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom rand1 = new Random();Di2015NewLineRandom rand2 = new Random(rand1.Next());Di2015NewLineTask firstRacer = Task.Run(() => Race(racerOne, rand1));Di2015NewLineTask secondRacer = Task.Run(() => Race(racerTwo, rand2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Race(Slider racer, Random rand)Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    int step = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (step < 1000)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        step += rand.Next(0, 10);Di2015NewLine        Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(new ThreadStart(() => racer.Value = step));Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(rand.Next(0, 300));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19977672Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass WhenAnyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static async Task<string> GetFirstToRespondAsync()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Call two web services; take the first response.Di2015NewLine        Task<string>[] tasks = new[] { Task1(), Task2() };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Await for the first one to respond.Di2015NewLine        Task<string> firstTask = await Task.WhenAny(tasks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the result.Di2015NewLine        return firstTask.Result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static async Task<string> Task1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await Task.Delay(3000);Di2015NewLine        return "Task1";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static async Task<string> Task2()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await Task.Delay(1000);Di2015NewLine        return "Task2";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19977672Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var t = WhenAny.GetFirstToRespondAsync();Di2015NewLine    t.ContinueWith((taskName) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string result = taskName.Result;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Result: " + result);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    t.Wait();Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19977672Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass WhenAllDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static async Task<string[]> WaitForAllAsync()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Call two web services; take the first response.Di2015NewLine        Task<string>[] tasks = new[] { Task1(), Task2(), Task3() };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wait for a tasksDi2015NewLine        string[] results = await Task.WhenAll(tasks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the result.Di2015NewLine        return results;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static async Task<string> Task1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await Task.Delay(3000);Di2015NewLine        return "Task1";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static async Task<string> Task2()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await Task.Delay(1000);Di2015NewLine        return "Task2";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static async Task<string> Task3()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await Task.Delay(5000);Di2015NewLine        return "Task3";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19977672Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     var t = WhenAll.WaitForAllAsync();Di2015NewLine     t.ContinueWith((task) =>Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         string[] result = task.Result;Di2015NewLine         foreach(string taskname in result)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             Console.WriteLine("Result: " + taskname);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     t.Wait();Di2015NewLine     Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19977698Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MessagePumpDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessagePump p = new MessagePump();Di2015NewLine            p.Start();Di2015NewLine            p.AddMessage(() => Console.WriteLine("message 1"));Di2015NewLine            p.AddMessage(() => Console.WriteLine("message 2"));Di2015NewLine            p.AddMessage(() => Console.WriteLine("message 3"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            p.Stop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class MessagePumpDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool m_Working = false;Di2015NewLine        Queue<Action> m_Actions = new Queue<Action>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Start()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_Working = true;Di2015NewLine            Thread t = new Thread(DoPump);Di2015NewLine            t.Name = "Message Pump Thread";Di2015NewLine            t.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        void DoPump()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (m_Working)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Monitor.Enter(m_Actions);Di2015NewLine                    while (m_Actions.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        m_Actions.Dequeue()(); //dequeue and invoke a delegateDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Monitor.Exit(m_Actions);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(100); //dont want to lock this core!Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void Stop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_Working = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AddMessage(Action act)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (m_Actions)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_Actions.Enqueue(act);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19979008Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring GetAllNumbersFrom(int first, int last, int step, string separator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (step == 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("zero step");Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Sign(last - first) * Math.Sign(step) < 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Cannot reach last in this direction");Di2015NewLine    int count = Math.Abs((last - first) / step) + 1;Di2015NewLine    var numbers = Enumerable.Range(0, count).Select(n => first + step * n);Di2015NewLine    return string.Join(separator, numbers);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19982221Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<PromotionalCodeValue> GetPromotionalCodeValues(string Platform)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This ensures that your connection gets closed even if there'sDi2015NewLine    // an exception thrown. 19983037Di2015UniqueSeparatorPartitionTuple<T>
19983037Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PartitionTuple<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  IEnumerable<T> source;Di2015NewLine  IList<T> before, after;Di2015NewLine  Func<T, bool> partition;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public PartitionTuple(IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, bool> partition)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.source = source;Di2015NewLine    this.partition = partition;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void EnsureMaterialized()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if(before == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      before = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine      after = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using(var enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        while(enumerator.MoveNext() && !partition(enumerator.Current))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          before.Add(enumerator.Current);   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while(!partition(enumerator.Current) && enumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while(enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          after.Add(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IEnumerable<T> Before Di2015NewLine  { Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      EnsureMaterialized();Di2015NewLine      return before;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IEnumerable<T> AfterDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      EnsureMaterialized();Di2015NewLine      return after;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static PartitionTuple<T> Partition<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence, Func<T, bool> partition)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return new PartitionTuple<T>(sequence, partition);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19983062Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class QTextBoxEx : QTextBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override bool ProcessCmdKey(ref Message msg, Keys keyData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // shortcut to search barDi2015NewLine        if (keyData == (Keys.Control | Keys.Back))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // 1st scenario: some text is already selected. Di2015NewLine            // In this case, delete only selected text. Di2015NewLine            if (SelectedText != "")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int selStart = SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine                Text = Text.Substring(0, selStart) + Di2015NewLine                    Text.Substring(selStart + SelectedText.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SelectionStart = selStart;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // 2nd scenario: delete word. Di2015NewLine            // 2 steps - delete "junk" and delete word.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // a) delete "junk" - non text/number characters until Di2015NewLine            // one letter/number is foundDi2015NewLine            for (int i = this.SelectionStart - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (char.IsLetterOrDigit(Text, i) == false)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Text = Text.Remove(i, 1);Di2015NewLine                    SelectionStart = i;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // delete wordDi2015NewLine            for (int i = this.SelectionStart - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (char.IsLetterOrDigit(Text, i))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Text = Text.Remove(i, 1);Di2015NewLine                    SelectionStart = i;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.ProcessCmdKey(ref msg, keyData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19984173Di2015UniqueSeparator// test DataTable objects for the exampleDi2015NewLinevar dt1 = new DataTable("Table 1");Di2015NewLinedt1.Columns.Add("title", typeof(string));Di2015NewLinedt1.Columns.Add("number", typeof(int));Di2015NewLinedt1.Columns.Add("subnum1", typeof(int));Di2015NewLinedt1.Columns.Add("subnum2", typeof(int));Di2015NewLinedt1.Rows.Add(new object[] { "a", 1111, 1, 1 }); // Exact match!Di2015NewLinedt1.Rows.Add(new object[] { "b", 2222, 1, 1 }); // Only NUMBER matchDi2015NewLinedt1.Rows.Add(new object[] { "b", 2222, 2, 2 }); // Only NUMBER matchDi2015NewLinedt1.Rows.Add(new object[] { "d", 3333, 1, 1 }); // Exact match!Di2015NewLinedt1.Rows.Add(new object[] { "d", 3333, 1, 2 });Di2015NewLinedt1.Rows.Add(new object[] { "d", 3333, 2, 1 });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar dt2 = new DataTable("Table 2");Di2015NewLinedt2.Columns.Add("number", typeof(int));Di2015NewLinedt2.Columns.Add("subnum1", typeof(int));Di2015NewLinedt2.Columns.Add("subnum2", typeof(int));Di2015NewLinedt2.Rows.Add(new object[] { 1111, 1, 1 }); // Exact match!Di2015NewLinedt2.Rows.Add(new object[] { 2222, 0, 5 }); // Only NUMBER matchDi2015NewLinedt2.Rows.Add(new object[] { 3333, 1, 1 }); // Exact match!Di2015NewLinedt2.Rows.Add(new object[] { 3333, 0, 0 }); // Only NUMBER matchDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (DataRow row in dt1.Rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var matches = dt2.Select(string.Format("number = {0} and subnum1 = {1} and subnum2 = {2}", row["number"], row["subnum1"], row["subnum2"]));Di2015NewLine    if (matches.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(row["title"]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fallback = dt2.Select(string.Format("number = {0}", row["number"]));Di2015NewLine        if (fallback.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(" > " + row["title"]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19985108Di2015UniqueSeparatorHashSet
19985108Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> intersectAll<T>(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var set = new HashSet<T>(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            set.IntersectWith(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19987998Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate double Getslope(List<double> ProductGrossExcessReturnOverRFR, Di2015NewLine                        List<double> primaryIndexExcessReturnOverRFR, Di2015NewLine                        int months, Di2015NewLine                        int go_back = 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // calc # of items to skipDi2015NewLine    int skip = ProductGrossExcessReturnOverRFR.Count - go_back - months;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get list of x's and y'sDi2015NewLine    var ys = ProductGrossExcessReturnOverRFR.Skip(skip).Take(months);Di2015NewLine    var xs = primaryIndexExcessReturnOverRFR.Skip(skip).Take(months);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // "zip" xs and ys to make the sum of products easierDi2015NewLine    var xys = Enumerable.Zip(xs,ys, (x, y) => new {x = x, y = y});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double xbar = xs.Average();Di2015NewLine    double ybar = ys.Average();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double slope = xys.Sum(xy => (xy.x - xbar) * (xy.y - ybar)) / xs.Sum(x => (x - xbar)*(x - xbar));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return slope;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19988745Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool CheckSame(string val, int cellX, int cellY, int deltaX, int deltaY)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(val))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (cellX >= 2 || cellY > 2)Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (cellX < 0 || cellY < 0)Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (cell[cellX][cellY] != val)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return CheckSame(val, cellX + deltaX, cellY + deltaY, deltaX, deltaY);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19991163Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate sealed class ComplexCalculationProgressDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public int PercentComplete { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ComplexCalculation(Object MyObject, IProgress<ComplexCalculationProgress> progress)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  (...do some time consuming operation on MyObject...);Di2015NewLine  if (progress != null)Di2015NewLine    progress.Report(new ComplexCalculationProgress { Name = MyObject.Name, PercentComplete = 50 });Di2015NewLine  (...do another time consuming operation on MyObject...);Di2015NewLine  if (progress != null)Di2015NewLine    progress.Report(new ComplexCalculationProgress { Name = MyObject.Name, PercentComplete = 100 });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19993007Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object ToType<T>(this object obj, IDictionary<string,string> maps) {Di2015NewLine    //create instance of T type object:Di2015NewLine    T tmp = Activator.CreateInstance<T>(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach( var map in maps) {Di2015NewLine        try Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo source = obj.GetType()Di2015NewLine                .GetProperty(map.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tmp.Unwrap().GetType().GetProperty(map.Key)Di2015NewLine                .SetValue(tmp.Unwrap(), source.GetValue(obj, null), null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Error converting to Type: "+ typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tmp.Unwrap();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19993007Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object ToType<T>(this object obj, IDictionary<string,string> maps) where T : new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //create instance of T type object:Di2015NewLine    T tmp = new T();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type objType = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine    Type tType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach( var map in maps) {Di2015NewLine        try Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo source = objType.GetProperty(map.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tType.GetProperty(map.Key)Di2015NewLine                .SetValue(tmp, source.GetValue(obj, null), null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Error converting to Type: "+ tType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tmp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLineConstructorInfo ctor = attributeType.GetConstructor(ctorParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Pass the constructor and an array of arguments (in this case, Di2015NewLine// an array containing a single string) to the  Di2015NewLine// CustomAttributeBuilder constructor. Di2015NewLine// Di2015NewLineobject[] ctorArgs = { "1.0.4.0" };     Di2015NewLineCustomAttributeBuilder attribute =Di2015NewLine   new CustomAttributeBuilder(ctor, ctorArgs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Finally, apply the attribute to the assembly. Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLineassemblyBuilder.SetCustomAttribute(attribute);Di2015NewLineassemblyBuilder.DefineVersionInfoResource();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Finally, save the assemblyDi2015NewLineassemblyBuilder.Save(name.Name + ".dll");Di2015NewLine

19993236Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string FindLongestPalindrome(string s) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string largest = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //start at i = 0 insteadDi2015NewLine    //Also needs to be to i < s.Length or fails some testsDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < s.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = i; j <= s.Length-i; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string substring = s.Substring(i, j);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //you also need to check that you're looking at a longer stringDi2015NewLine            //this really could be optimized anyway, but here it is for simplicityDi2015NewLine            if (substring.Length > largest.Length && IsPalindrome(substring))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                largest = substring;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return largest;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19993836Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar nodes = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// !! populate your nodes list with all your real nodes first!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// filter to nodes with at most 1 parent and 1 childDi2015NewLine// group by a tuple containing the parent (if it exists) and the child (if it exists)Di2015NewLinevar grouped = nodes.Where(i => i.Children.Count <= 1 && i.Parents.Count <= 1)Di2015NewLine    .GroupBy(i => Di2015NewLine        new Tuple<Node, Node>(i.Parents.Count == 0 ? null : i.Parents[0], Di2015NewLine                                i.Children.Count == 0 ? null : i.Children[0]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// go through your groups - each one should be a cluster of nodes to be mergedDi2015NewLineforeach (var group in grouped)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get the first node in the group (which one is arbitrary if we're merging anyway)Di2015NewLine    var node = group.First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if this group has a parentDi2015NewLine    if (node.Parents.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // change the parent to only have one child - this one!Di2015NewLine        node.Parents[0].Children.Clear();Di2015NewLine        node.Parents[0].Children.Add(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if this group has a childDi2015NewLine    if (node.Children.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // change the child to only have one parent - this one!Di2015NewLine        node.Children[0].Parents.Clear();Di2015NewLine        node.Children[0].Parents.Add(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19995685Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void AddNode(int valueToBeInserted)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (root == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        root = new Node(valueToBeInserted);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AddRoot(valueToBeInserted, root);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void AddNode(int valueToBeInserted, Node current)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (valueToBeInserted < current.value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (current.left == null)Di2015NewLine            current.left = new Node(valueToBeInserted);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            AddNode(valueToBeInserted, current.left);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (valueToBeInserted > current.value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (current.right == null)Di2015NewLine            current.right = new Node(valueToBeInserted);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            AddNode(valueToBeInserted, current.right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20000831Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Occurs when upload backup application bar button is clicked. Author : Farhan GhumraDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void UploadFilesToServer(Uri uri, Dictionary<string, string> data, string fileName, string fileContentType, byte[] fileData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string boundary = "----------" + DateTime.Now.Ticks.ToString("x");Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest httpWebRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.ContentType = "multipart/form-data; boundary=" + boundary;Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream((result) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)result.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine            using (Stream requestStream = request.EndGetRequestStream(result))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                WriteMultipartForm(requestStream, boundary, data, fileName, fileContentType, fileData);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            request.BeginGetResponse(a =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var response = request.EndGetResponse(a);Di2015NewLine                    var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine                    using (var sr = new StreamReader(responseStream))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        using (StreamReader streamReader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            string responseString = streamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                            //responseString is depend upon your web service.Di2015NewLine                            if (responseString == "Success")Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                MessageBox.Show("Backup stored successfully on server.");Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                MessageBox.Show("Error occurred while uploading backup on server.");Di2015NewLine                            } Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }, httpWebRequest);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Writes multi part HTTP POST request. Author : Farhan GhumraDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void WriteMultipartForm(Stream s, string boundary, Dictionary<string, string> data, string fileName, string fileContentType, byte[] fileData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// The first boundaryDi2015NewLine    byte[] boundarybytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("--" + boundary + "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    /// the last boundary.Di2015NewLine    byte[] trailer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("\\r\\n--" + boundary + "‚Äì-\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    /// the form data, properly formattedDi2015NewLine    string formdataTemplate = "Content-Dis-data; name=\\"{0}\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n{1}";Di2015NewLine    /// the form-data file upload, properly formattedDi2015NewLine    string fileheaderTemplate = "Content-Dis-data; name=\\"{0}\\"; filename=\\"{1}\\";\\r\\nContent-Type: {2}\\r\\n\\r\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// Added to track if we need a CRLF or not.Di2015NewLine    bool bNeedsCRLF = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (data != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (string key in data.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /// if we need to drop a CRLF, do that.Di2015NewLine            if (bNeedsCRLF)Di2015NewLine                WriteToStream(s, "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// Write the boundary.Di2015NewLine            WriteToStream(s, boundarybytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// Write the key.Di2015NewLine            WriteToStream(s, string.Format(formdataTemplate, key, data[key]));Di2015NewLine            bNeedsCRLF = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// If we don't have keys, we don't need a crlf.Di2015NewLine    if (bNeedsCRLF)Di2015NewLine        WriteToStream(s, "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WriteToStream(s, boundarybytes);Di2015NewLine    WriteToStream(s, string.Format(fileheaderTemplate, "file", fileName, fileContentType));Di2015NewLine    /// Write the file data to the stream.Di2015NewLine    WriteToStream(s, fileData);Di2015NewLine    WriteToStream(s, trailer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Writes string to stream. Author : Farhan GhumraDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void WriteToStream(Stream s, string txt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(txt);Di2015NewLine    s.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Writes byte array to stream. Author : Farhan GhumraDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void WriteToStream(Stream s, byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    s.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns byte array from StorageFile. Author : Farhan GhumraDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate async Task<byte[]> GetBytesAsync(StorageFile file)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] fileBytes = null;Di2015NewLine    using (var stream = await file.OpenReadAsync())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fileBytes = new byte[stream.Size];Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new DataReader(stream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            await reader.LoadAsync((uint)stream.Size);Di2015NewLine            reader.ReadBytes(fileBytes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return fileBytes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20001285Di2015UniqueSeparator    private ReaderWriterLockSlim _readerWriterLock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private DataTable RunSelectSQL(string Sql)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable selectDataTable = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _readerWriterLock.EnterReadLock();                Di2015NewLine            //Function to acess your database and return the selected resultsDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _readerWriterLock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return selectDataTable;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private DataTable RunInsertSQL(string Sql)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable selectDataTable = null;Di2015NewLine        bool isbreaked = false;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _readerWriterLock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine            if (_readerWriterLock.WaitingReadCount > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                isbreaked = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Function to insert data in your databaseDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _readerWriterLock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (isbreaked)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(10);Di2015NewLine            return RunInsertSQL(Sql);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return selectDataTable;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20007080Di2015UniqueSeparator   // Our memory model guarantee if we pick up the change in bucket from another processor,Di2015NewLine   // we will see the 'isWriterProgress' flag to be true or 'version' is changed in the reader.Di2015NewLine   //Di2015NewLine   int spinCount = 0;Di2015NewLine   do {Di2015NewLine       // this is violate read, following memory accesses can not be moved ahead of it.Di2015NewLine       currentversion = version;Di2015NewLine       b = lbuckets[bucketNumber];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // The contention between reader and writer shouldn't happen frequently.Di2015NewLine       // But just in case this will burn CPU, yield the control of CPU if we spinned a few times.Di2015NewLine       // 8 is just a random number I pick.Di2015NewLine       if( (++spinCount) % 8 == 0 ) {Di2015NewLine           Thread.Sleep(1);   // 1 means we are yeilding control to all threads, including low-priority ones.Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine   } while ( isWriterInProgress || (currentversion != version) );Di2015NewLine

20008537Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication17Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class CachedMergerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Dictionary<HashSet<int>, string> _cache = new Dictionary<HashSet<int>, string>();Di2015NewLine        private Dictionary<int, string> _items = new Dictionary<int, string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AddItem(int index, string item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _items[index] = item;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void RemoveItem(int index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _items.Remove(index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string Merge(string a, string b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return a + b;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string Merge(HashSet<int> list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var index in list)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!_items.ContainsKey(index))Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    sb.Append(_items[index]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return sb.ToString();         Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Get(HashSet<int> query)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bestMatchKey = BestMatchKey(query);Di2015NewLine            if (bestMatchKey == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = Merge(query);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (result == null)Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Requested item not found in the item list.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _cache[query] = result;Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (bestMatchKey.Count == query.Count)Di2015NewLine                    return _cache[bestMatchKey];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var missing = new HashSet<int>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var index in query)Di2015NewLine                    if (!bestMatchKey.Contains(index))Di2015NewLine                        missing.Add(index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return Merge(_cache[bestMatchKey], Get(missing));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private HashSet<int> BestMatchKey(HashSet<int> set)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int bestCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            HashSet<int> bestKey = null;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var entry in _cache)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var key = entry.Key;Di2015NewLine                int count = 0;Di2015NewLine                bool fail = false;Di2015NewLine                foreach (var i in key)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (set.Contains(i))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        count++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        fail = true;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!fail && count > bestCount)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bestKey = key;Di2015NewLine                    bestCount = count;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return bestKey;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var cm = new CachedMerger();Di2015NewLine            // Add all the base partsDi2015NewLine            cm.AddItem(0, "sjkdlajkld");Di2015NewLine            cm.AddItem(1, "dffdfdfdf");Di2015NewLine            cm.AddItem(2, "qwqwqw");Di2015NewLine            cm.AddItem(3, "yuyuyuyy");Di2015NewLine            cm.AddItem(4, "kjkjkjkjkj");Di2015NewLine            cm.AddItem(5, "oioyuyiyui");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This will merge 0 + 1 + 3 + 4 since the cache is emptyDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(cm.Get(new HashSet<int> { 0, 1, 3, 4 }));Di2015NewLine            // This will merge 2 + 5 as there is no match in the cacheDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(cm.Get(new HashSet<int> { 2, 5 }));Di2015NewLine            // This will merge (2 + 5) from the cache with 3Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(cm.Get(new HashSet<int> { 2, 3, 5 }));Di2015NewLine            // This will merge (0 + 1 + 3 + 4) from the cache with (2 + 5) from the cacheDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(cm.Get(new HashSet<int> { 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20008915Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyFormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private bool _b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void gdcSVNDefaultView_MouseDown(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var vw = (GridView)sender;Di2015NewLine        var hitInfo = vw.CalcHitInfo(e.Location);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (hitInfo.HitTest == GridHitTest.RowGroupButton)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _b = false;Di2015NewLine        if (vw.IsGroupRow(hitInfo.RowHandle))Di2015NewLine            _b = SelectChildRows(hitInfo.RowHandle, vw);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DXMouseEventArgs.GetMouseArgs(e).Handled = _b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void gdcSVNDefaultView_MouseUp(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DXMouseEventArgs.GetMouseArgs(e).Handled = _b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool SelectChildRows(int r, GridView view)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!view.GetRowExpanded((r)))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ModifierKeys != Keys.Shift && ModifierKeys != Keys.Control)Di2015NewLine            view.ClearSelection();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var childRowCount = view.GetChildRowCount(r);Di2015NewLine        var first = view.GetChildRowHandle(r, 0);Di2015NewLine        var last = (first + childRowCount - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        view.SelectRange(first, last);Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20013834Di2015UniqueSeparatorOnLoad
20013834Di2015UniqueSeparatorLoaded
20013834Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ObservableCollection<DbObject> DbObjects { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate async void OnLoad(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // (2) UI Thread enters OnLoadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var observableData = CatalogService.Instance.DataSource.Publish();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var chunked = observableDataDi2015NewLine        // (6) Thread A OnNext passes into BufferDi2015NewLine        .Buffer(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(100));Di2015NewLine        // (7) Thread B, threadpool thread used by Buffer to run timer Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dispatcherObs = chunkedDi2015NewLine        // (8) Thread B stillDi2015NewLine        .ObserveOnDispatcher(DispatcherPriority.Background);Di2015NewLine        // (9) Non blocking OnNexts back to UI ThreadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dispatcherObs.Subscribe(dbObjects =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // (10) UI Thread receives buffered dbObjects            Di2015NewLine        foreach (var dbObject in dbObjects)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // (11) UI Thread hurting while all these images areDi2015NewLine            // stuffed in the collection in one go - This is the issue I bet.Di2015NewLine            DbObjects.Add(dbObject);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    await Task.Run(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // (3) Thread A - a threadpool thread,Di2015NewLine        // triggers subscription to DataSourceDi2015NewLine        // UI Thread is *NOT BLOCKED* due to awaitDi2015NewLine        observableData.Connect()Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    // (13) UI Thread - Dispatcher call back here at end of Create callDi2015NewLine    // BUT UI THREAD WAS NOT BLOCKED!!!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // (14) UI Thread - This task will be already completedDi2015NewLine    // It is causing a second subscription to the already completed published observableDi2015NewLine    await dispatcherObs.ToTask();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CatalogServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public IObservable<DbObject> DataSourceDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Observable.Create<DbObject>(obs =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // (4) Thread A runs Database query synchronouslyDi2015NewLine                var cursor = Database.Instance.GetAllObjects();Di2015NewLine                var status = cursor.MoveToFirst();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (status == DbStatus.OK)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var dbObject= Db.Create(cursor);Di2015NewLine                    // (5) Thread A call OnNextDi2015NewLine                    obs.OnNext(dbObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    status = cursor.MoveToNext();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                obs.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine                // (12) Thread A finally completes subscription due to Connect()Di2015NewLine                return Disposable.Empty;Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20015077Di2015UniqueSeparator    // create date time 2008-03-09 16:05:07.123Di2015NewLineDateTime dt = new DateTime(2008, 3, 9, 16, 5, 7, 123);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineString.Format("{0:y yy yyy yyyy}", dt);  // "8 08 008 2008"   yearDi2015NewLineString.Format("{0:M MM MMM MMMM}", dt);  // "3 03 Mar March"  monthDi2015NewLineString.Format("{0:d dd ddd dddd}", dt);  // "9 09 Sun Sunday" dayDi2015NewLineString.Format("{0:h hh H HH}",     dt);  // "4 04 16 16"      hour 12/24Di2015NewLineString.Format("{0:m mm}",          dt);  // "5 05"            minuteDi2015NewLineString.Format("{0:s ss}",          dt);  // "7 07"            secondDi2015NewLineString.Format("{0:f ff fff ffff}", dt);  // "1 12 123 1230"   sec.fractionDi2015NewLineString.Format("{0:F FF FFF FFFF}", dt);  // "1 12 123 123"    without zeroesDi2015NewLineString.Format("{0:t tt}",          dt);  // "P PM"            A.M. or P.M.Di2015NewLineString.Format("{0:z zz zzz}",      dt);  // "-6 -06 -06:00"   time zoneDi2015NewLine

20016429Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing UnityEngine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TileMap : MonoBehaviour {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int size_x = 100;Di2015NewLine    public int size_z = 50;Di2015NewLine    public float tileSize = 1.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use this for initializationDi2015NewLine    void Start() {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void CreateMapLayer() {Di2015NewLine        GameObject mapLayerGO = new GameObject();Di2015NewLine        mapLayerGO.transform.parent = gameObject.transform;Di2015NewLine        MapLayer mapLayer = mapLayerGO.AddComponent<MapLayer>();Di2015NewLine        mapLayer.Initialize();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20016429Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing UnityEngine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[RequireComponent(typeof(MeshFilter))]Di2015NewLine[RequireComponent(typeof(MeshRenderer))]Di2015NewLine[RequireComponent(typeof(MeshCollider))]Di2015NewLinepublic class MapLayer : MonoBehaviour {Di2015NewLine    private TileMap parentTileMap;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Start() {Di2015NewLine        parentTileMap = transform.parent.GetComponent<TileMap>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use this for initializationDi2015NewLine    public void Initialize() {Di2015NewLine        BuildMesh();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void BuildMesh() {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int numTiles = parentTileMap.size_x * parentTileMap.size_z;Di2015NewLine        int numTris = numTiles * 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int vsize_x = parentTileMap.size_x + 1;Di2015NewLine        int vsize_z = parentTileMap.size_z + 1;Di2015NewLine        int numVerts = vsize_x * vsize_z;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Generate the mesh dataDi2015NewLine        Vector3[] vertices = new Vector3[numVerts];Di2015NewLine        Vector3[] normals = new Vector3[numVerts];Di2015NewLine        Vector2[] uv = new Vector2[numVerts];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int[] triangles = new int[numTris * 3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int x, z;Di2015NewLine        for (z = 0; z < vsize_z; z++) {Di2015NewLine            for (x = 0; x < vsize_x; x++) {Di2015NewLine                vertices[z * vsize_x + x] = new Vector3(x * parentTileMap.tileSize, 0, z * parentTileMap.tileSize);Di2015NewLine                normals[z * vsize_x + x] = Vector3.up;Di2015NewLine                uv[z * vsize_x + x] = new Vector2((float)x / vsize_x, (float)z / vsize_z);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Debug.Log("Done Verts!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (z = 0; z < parentTileMap.size_z; z++) {Di2015NewLine            for (x = 0; x < parentTileMap.size_x; x++) {Di2015NewLine                int squareIndex = z * parentTileMap.size_x + x;Di2015NewLine                int triOffset = squareIndex * 6;Di2015NewLine                triangles[triOffset + 0] = z * vsize_x + x + 0;Di2015NewLine                triangles[triOffset + 1] = z * vsize_x + x + vsize_x + 0;Di2015NewLine                triangles[triOffset + 2] = z * vsize_x + x + vsize_x + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                triangles[triOffset + 3] = z * vsize_x + x + 0;Di2015NewLine                triangles[triOffset + 4] = z * vsize_x + x + vsize_x + 1;Di2015NewLine                triangles[triOffset + 5] = z * vsize_x + x + 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Debug.Log("Done Triangles!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a new Mesh and populate with the dataDi2015NewLine        Mesh mesh = new Mesh();Di2015NewLine        mesh.vertices = vertices;Di2015NewLine        mesh.triangles = triangles;Di2015NewLine        mesh.normals = normals;Di2015NewLine        mesh.uv = uv;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Assign our mesh to our filter/renderer/colliderDi2015NewLine        MeshFilter mesh_filter = gameObject.GetComponent<MeshFilter>();Di2015NewLine        MeshRenderer mesh_renderer = gameObject.GetComponent<MeshRenderer>(); ;Di2015NewLine        MeshCollider mesh_collider = gameObject.GetComponent<MeshCollider>(); ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mesh_filter.mesh = mesh;Di2015NewLine        mesh_collider.sharedMesh = mesh;Di2015NewLine        Debug.Log("Done Mesh!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20020346Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] rand_word = {apple, bannnana, cat, dog, eatttt}//5 words to check with the dictionary. Amount of words in here can vary later, that's why I am using a loop bellowDi2015NewLinestring likelihood = 0;Di2015NewLineList<Thread> threads = new List<Thread>();Di2015NewLineforeach (string line in rand_word)Di2015NewLine{        Di2015NewLine    Thread thread1 = new Thread(new ThreadStart(() => dictionary_match(line, ref likelihood)));Di2015NewLine    thread1.Start();Di2015NewLine    threads.Add(thread1);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Value of likelihood Inside the Loop= " + likelihood); //Will show 0 since the dictionary_match function isn't finished runningDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Value of likelihood after the Loop= " + likelihood);//Will give 0 since the dictionary_match function isn't finishedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var thread in threads)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    thread.Join();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Final Value likelihood = " + likelihood); //After pausing for a while, dictionary_match function finished processing and gives an appropriate value for likelihood variableDi2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class TreeDataVisualizer : DialogDebuggerVisualizerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        protected override void Show(IDialogVisualizerService windowService, IVisualizerObjectProvider objectProvider)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (windowService == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("windowService");Di2015NewLine            if (objectProvider == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("objectProvider");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var treeData = (ITreeData)objectProvider.GetObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var treeView = new TreeView())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                treeView.AutoSize = true;Di2015NewLine                treeView.Dock = DockStyle.Fill;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var topNode = treeView.Nodes.Add(treeData.Top.Data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Recursively populate all of the child nodes.Di2015NewLine                PopulateNodes(topNode, treeData.Top);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                windowService.ShowDialog(treeView);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void PopulateNodes(TreeNode node, ITreeDataNode treeDataNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var childNode in treeDataNode.Children)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newNode = node.Nodes.Add(childNode.Data);Di2015NewLine                PopulateNodes(newNode, childNode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20024774Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate BitmapSource CopyRegion(Di2015NewLine    BitmapSource sourceBitmap, Int32Rect sourceRect,Di2015NewLine    BitmapSource targetBitmap, int targetX, int targetY)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (sourceBitmap.Format != targetBitmap.Format)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine            "Source and target bitmap must have the same PixelFormat.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var bytesPerPixel = (sourceBitmap.Format.BitsPerPixel + 7) / 8;Di2015NewLine    var stride = bytesPerPixel * sourceRect.Width;Di2015NewLine    var pixelBuffer = new byte[stride * sourceRect.Height];Di2015NewLine    sourceBitmap.CopyPixels(sourceRect, pixelBuffer, stride, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var outputBitmap = new WriteableBitmap(targetBitmap);Di2015NewLine    sourceRect.X = targetX;Di2015NewLine    sourceRect.Y = targetY;Di2015NewLine    outputBitmap.WritePixels(sourceRect, pixelBuffer, stride, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return outputBitmap;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20027419Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InstructionCyclesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ConcurrentDictionary<Action, string> _dictActionResults = new ConcurrentDictionary<Action, string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void fetch()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do something and store the result in the dictionaryDi2015NewLine        _dictActionResults[fetch] = "FetchResult";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void decode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do something and store the result in the dictionaryDi2015NewLine        _dictActionResults[decode] = "DecodeResult";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void execute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do something and store the result in the dictionaryDi2015NewLine        _dictActionResults[execute] = "ExecuteResult";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void writeBack()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do something and store the result in the dictionaryDi2015NewLine        _dictActionResults[writeBack] = "WriteBackResult";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void nextInstruction()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InstructionCycles instrCycles = new InstructionCycles();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action[] actions = Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            instrCycles.fetch,Di2015NewLine            instrCycles.decode,Di2015NewLine            instrCycles.execute,Di2015NewLine            instrCycles.writeBackDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Parallel.Invoke(actions);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // output the results in sequential orderDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Action a in actions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Out.WriteLine(instrCycles._dictActionResults[a]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20027419Di2015UniqueSeparatorInstructionCycles.nextInstruction()

20035089Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int Move(this YAxisList list, GraphPane pane, int index, int relativePos)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (index < 0 || index >= list.Count)Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var axis = list[index];Di2015NewLine    list.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var newIndex = index + relativePos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (newIndex < 0)Di2015NewLine        newIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    if (newIndex > list.Count)Di2015NewLine        newIndex = list.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    list.Insert(newIndex, axis);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var curve in pane.CurveList)Di2015NewLine        if (curve.YAxisIndex == newIndex)Di2015NewLine            curve.YAxisIndex = index;Di2015NewLine        else if (curve.YAxisIndex == index)Di2015NewLine            curve.YAxisIndex = newIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newIndex;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20035664Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void SplitDocument()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var doc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        doc.Load("HtmlDoc.html");Di2015NewLine        var links = doc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes("//a[@href]");Di2015NewLine        var firstPart = GetFirstPart(doc.DocumentNode, links[0]).DocumentNode.InnerHtml;Di2015NewLine        var secondPart = GetSecondPart(links[0]).DocumentNode.InnerHtml;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static HtmlDocument GetFirstPart(HtmlNode currNode, HtmlNode link)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var nodeStack = new Stack<Tuple<HtmlNode, HtmlNode>>();        Di2015NewLine        var newDoc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        var parent = newDoc.DocumentNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        nodeStack.Push(new Tuple<HtmlNode, HtmlNode>(currNode, parent));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (nodeStack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var curr = nodeStack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            var copyNode = curr.Item1.CloneNode(false);Di2015NewLine            curr.Item2.AppendChild(copyNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (curr.Item1 == link)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var nodeToRemove = NodeAndEmptyAncestors(copyNode);Di2015NewLine                nodeToRemove.ParentNode.RemoveChild(nodeToRemove);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (var i = curr.Item1.ChildNodes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nodeStack.Push(new Tuple<HtmlNode, HtmlNode>(curr.Item1.ChildNodes[i], copyNode));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return newDoc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static HtmlDocument GetSecondPart(HtmlNode link)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var nodeStack = new Stack<HtmlNode>();Di2015NewLine        var newDoc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var currNode = link;Di2015NewLine        while (currNode.ParentNode != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currNode = currNode.ParentNode;Di2015NewLine            nodeStack.Push(currNode.CloneNode(false));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parent = newDoc.DocumentNode;Di2015NewLine        while (nodeStack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var node = nodeStack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            parent.AppendChild(node);Di2015NewLine            parent = node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var newLink = link.CloneNode(false);Di2015NewLine        parent.AppendChild(newLink);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currNode = link;Di2015NewLine        var newParent = newLink.ParentNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (currNode.ParentNode != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var foundNode = false;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var child in currNode.ParentNode.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (foundNode) newParent.AppendChild(child.Clone());Di2015NewLine                if (child == currNode) foundNode = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            currNode = currNode.ParentNode;Di2015NewLine            newParent = newParent.ParentNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var nodeToRemove = NodeAndEmptyAncestors(newLink);Di2015NewLine        nodeToRemove.ParentNode.RemoveChild(nodeToRemove);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return newDoc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static HtmlNode NodeAndEmptyAncestors(HtmlNode node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var currNode = node;Di2015NewLine        while (currNode.ParentNode != null && currNode.ParentNode.ChildNodes.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currNode = currNode.ParentNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return currNode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20039568Di2015UniqueSeparatorObservable.Sample
20039568Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ObservableExDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IObservable<T> ThrottleMax<T>(this IObservable<T> source, TimeSpan dueTime, TimeSpan maxTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source.ThrottleMax(dueTime, maxTime, Scheduler.Default);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IObservable<T> ThrottleMax<T>(this IObservable<T> source, TimeSpan dueTime, TimeSpan maxTime, IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Observable.Create<T>(o =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var hasValue = false;Di2015NewLine            T value = default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var maxTimeDisposable = new SerialDisposable();Di2015NewLine            var dueTimeDisposable = new SerialDisposable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Action action = () =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (hasValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    maxTimeDisposable.Disposable = Disposable.Empty;Di2015NewLine                    dueTimeDisposable.Disposable = Disposable.Empty;Di2015NewLine                    o.OnNext(value);Di2015NewLine                    hasValue = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return source.Subscribe(Di2015NewLine                x =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!hasValue)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        maxTimeDisposable.Disposable = scheduler.Schedule(maxTime, action);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    hasValue = true;Di2015NewLine                    value = x;Di2015NewLine                    dueTimeDisposable.Disposable = scheduler.Schedule(dueTime, action);Di2015NewLine                },Di2015NewLine                o.OnError,Di2015NewLine                o.OnCompletedDi2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20045505Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void BulkInsertBigData<T>(Table<T> definition, IEnumerable<T> rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var copy = new SqlBulkCopy(definition.Context.Connection.ConnectionString, SqlBulkCopyOptions.KeepIdentity | SqlBulkCopyOptions.KeepNulls))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var meta = definition.Context.Mapping.GetMetaType(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        foreach (var col in meta.DataMembers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            copy.ColumnMappings.Add(col.Member.Name, col.MappedName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        copy.DestinationTableName = meta.Table.TableName;Di2015NewLine        var data = rows.ToDataTable();Di2015NewLine        copy.WriteToServer(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20045505Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataTable
20045505Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void BulkInsertBigData<T>(Table<T> definition, IEnumerable<T> rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var copy = new SqlBulkCopy(definition.Context.Connection.ConnectionString, SqlBulkCopyOptions.KeepIdentity | SqlBulkCopyOptions.KeepNulls))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var meta = definition.Context.Mapping.GetMetaType(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        var members = new List<string>(meta.DataMembers.Count);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var col in meta.DataMembers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            copy.ColumnMappings.Add(col.Member.Name, col.MappedName);Di2015NewLine            members.Add(col.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        copy.DestinationTableName = meta.Table.TableName;Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = ObjectReader.Create(rows, members.ToArray()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            copy.WriteToServer(reader);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20046449Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<T> FindNodeInTree<T>(Di2015NewLine            T rootNode, Func<T, bool> predicate, bool firstOnly = falseDi2015NewLine        ) where T : ObservableTreeNode<K, V>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var resultNodes = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        var nodeQueue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine        nodeQueue.Enqueue(rootNode);Di2015NewLine        while (nodeQueue.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T currentNode = nodeQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("Current node key: {0}", currentNode.Key);Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(currentNode))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine("Match!");Di2015NewLine                resultNodes.Add(currentNode);Di2015NewLine                if (firstOnly)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Debug.WriteLine("-FindInContext");Di2015NewLine                    return resultNodes;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("The current node has {0} children.", currentNode.VirtualChildren.Count);Di2015NewLine            foreach (T n in currentNode.VirtualChildren)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine("Enqueue child...");Di2015NewLine                nodeQueue.Enqueue(n);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return resultNodes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20055808Di2015UniqueSeparator public List<string> getfiles(string FTPhostname, string FTPpath,string FTPusername,string FTPpassword,string extension)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FtpWebRequest ftpRequest = (FtpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create("ftp://" + FTPhostname + "/" + FTPpath );Di2015NewLine        ftpRequest.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(FTPusername , FTPpassword );Di2015NewLine        ftpRequest.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FtpWebResponse response = (FtpWebResponse)ftpRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        StreamReader streamReader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<string> results = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string line = streamReader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        while (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(line))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (line.Contains(extension)) {Di2015NewLine                line = streamReader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                results.Add(line);}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            else {line = streamReader.ReadLine(); }Di2015NewLine                           }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        streamReader.Close();Di2015NewLine        return results;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

                     }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    ppv = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine                    return CustomQueryInterfaceResult.Failed;Di2015NewLine 20061207Di2015UniqueSeparatorMessageBox.Show
