20061225Di2015UniqueSeparator// code adapted from Di2015NewLine// http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/d51efcf0-7653-403e-95b6-bf5fb97bf16c/suspend-thread-of-a-processDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SkypeLauncherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Process[] procs = Process.GetProcessesByName("skype");Di2015NewLine            if (procs.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Skype not loaded. Launching. ");Di2015NewLine                Process.Start(Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables(@"%PROGRAMFILES(X86)%\\Skype\\Phone\\Skype.exe"));Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(8000); // wait to allow skype to start up & get into steady stateDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // wait to allow skype to start up & get into steady state, where "steady state" meansDi2015NewLine            // a lot of threads createdDi2015NewLine            Process proc = null;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 50; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                procs = Process.GetProcessesByName("skype");Di2015NewLine                if (procs != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    proc = procs[0];Di2015NewLine                    if (proc.Threads.Count > 10)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000); // wait to allow skype to start up & get into steady stateDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // try multiple times; if not hanging after a while, give up. It must not be hanging!Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 50; i++)    Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // must reload process to get updated thread time infoDi2015NewLine                procs = Process.GetProcessesByName("skype");Di2015NewLine                if (procs.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Skype not loaded. Exiting. ");Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                proc = procs[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // avoid case where exception thrown if thread is no longer around when looking at its CPU time, orDi2015NewLine                // any other reason why we can't read the timeDi2015NewLine                var safeTotalProcessorTime = new Func<ProcessThread, double> (t => Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        try { return t.TotalProcessorTime.TotalMilliseconds; }Di2015NewLine                        catch (InvalidOperationException) { return 0; }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var threads = (from t in proc.Threads.OfType<ProcessThread>()Di2015NewLine                                  orderby safeTotalProcessorTime(t) descendingDi2015NewLine                                  select new  Di2015NewLine                                  {Di2015NewLine                                      t.Id, Di2015NewLine                                      t.ThreadState, Di2015NewLine                                      TotalProcessorTime = safeTotalProcessorTime(t),  Di2015NewLine                                  } Di2015NewLine                              ).ToList();Di2015NewLine                var totalCpuMsecs = threads.Sum(t => t.TotalProcessorTime);Di2015NewLine                var topThread = threads[0];Di2015NewLine                var nextThread = threads[1];Di2015NewLine                var topThreadCpuMsecs = topThread.TotalProcessorTime;Di2015NewLine                var topThreadRatio = topThreadCpuMsecs / nextThread.TotalProcessorTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // suspend skype thread that's taken a lot of CPU time and Di2015NewLine                // and it has lots more CPU than any other thread. Di2015NewLine                // in other words, it's been ill-behaved for a long time!Di2015NewLine                // it's possible that this may sometimes suspend the wrong thread, Di2015NewLine                // but I haven't seen it break yet. Di2015NewLine                if (topThreadCpuMsecs > 10000 && topThreadRatio > 5)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("{0} bad thread. {0:N0} msecs CPU, {1:N1}x CPU than next top thread.",Di2015NewLine                        topThread.ThreadState == System.Diagnostics.ThreadState.Wait ? "Already suspended" : "Suspending",Di2015NewLine                        topThreadCpuMsecs, Di2015NewLine                        topThreadRatio);Di2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    IntPtr handle = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Get the thread handle & suspend the threadDi2015NewLine                        handle = OpenThread(2, false, topThread.Id);Di2015NewLine                        var success = SuspendThread(handle);Di2015NewLine                        if (success == -1)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Win32Exception ex = new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Exiting");Di2015NewLine                        Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine                        return;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    finallyDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (handle != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                            CloseHandle(handle);Di2015NewLine                    };Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Top thread: {0:N0} msecs CPU, {1:N1}x CPU than next top thread. Waiting.",Di2015NewLine                    topThreadCpuMsecs,Di2015NewLine                    topThreadRatio);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(2000); // wait between triesDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("No skype thread is ill-behaved enough. Giving up.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern int SuspendThread(IntPtr hThread);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern bool CloseHandle(IntPtr handle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static externDi2015NewLine        IntPtr OpenThread(int dwDesiredAccess, [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]bool bInheritHandle, int dwThreadId);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

      gotInput.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string ReadLine(int timeOutMillisecs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       throw new TimeoutException("User did not provide input within the timelimit.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20063418Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class EntityConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Type, Type> _mappings =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<Type, Type>()Di2015NewLine destination = Activator.CreateInstance<TDestination>();Di2015NewLine        TransferValues(source, destination);Di2015NewLine        return destination;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20064792Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class EvaluatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public enum TokenTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Field,Di2015NewLine        Comparer,Di2015NewLine        Value,Di2015NewLine        Operator,Di2015NewLine        ParenthesisDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TokenDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TokenType TokenType;Di2015NewLine        public string Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string statement;Di2015NewLine    private int cursor = 0;Di2015NewLine    private Token curToken;Di2015NewLine    private object target;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Evaluator(string statement, object target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.statement = statement;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool EvaluateStatement()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GetNextToken();Di2015NewLine        bool value = EvaluateExpression();Di2015NewLine        if (curToken != null && curToken.TokenType == TokenType.Operator)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var op = curToken;Di2015NewLine            GetNextToken();Di2015NewLine            var v2 = EvaluateExpression();Di2015NewLine            if (op.Value == "AND")Di2015NewLine                return value && v2;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return value || v2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool EvaluateExpression()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (curToken.TokenType == TokenType.Parenthesis)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GetNextToken();Di2015NewLine            bool value = EvaluateExpression();Di2015NewLine            GetNextToken(); // skip closing parenthesisDi2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var fieldName = curToken.Value;Di2015NewLine        GetNextToken();Di2015NewLine        var op = curToken.Value;Di2015NewLine        GetNextToken();Di2015NewLine        var targetValue = curToken.Value;Di2015NewLine        GetNextToken();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fieldValue = GetFieldValue(target, fieldName);Di2015NewLine        return EvaluateComparer(fieldValue, targetValue, op);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool EvaluateComparer(string left, string right, string op)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (op == "=")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return left == right;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (op == "!=")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return left != right;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // add more ops hereDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Invalid op");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get the next token from the input string, put it into 'curToken' and advance 'cursor'.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void GetNextToken()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // skip spacesDi2015NewLine        while (cursor < statement.Length || Char.IsWhiteSpace(statement[cursor]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cursor++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (cursor >= statement.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            curToken = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var remainder = statement.Substring(cursor);Di2015NewLine        if (remainder.StartsWith("Name"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cursor += "Name".Length;Di2015NewLine            curToken = new TokenDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TokenType = TokenType.Field,Di2015NewLine                Value = "Name"Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (remainder.StartsWith("!="))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cursor += "!=".Length;Di2015NewLine            curToken = new TokenDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TokenType = TokenType.Field,Di2015NewLine                Value = "!="Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // etc.Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Unexpected token");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string GetFieldValue(object target, string fieldName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // trivial to implement with fixed set of field namesDi2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20067450Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class CircularBuffer<T>: IEnumerable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Constructor.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="capacity">The maximum capacity of the buffer.</param>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CircularBuffer(int capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The reason for this +1 is to simplify the logic - we can use "front == back" to indicate an empty buffer.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _buffer = new T[capacity+1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>The buffer capacity.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CapacityDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _buffer.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>The number of elements currently stored in the buffer.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int result = _back - _front;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (result < 0)Di2015NewLine                    result += _buffer.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Is the buffer empty?</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsEmptyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return this.Count == 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Is the buffer full? (i.e. has it reached its capacity?)</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsFullDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return nextSlot(_back) == _front;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Empties the buffer.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Empty()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _front = _back = 0;Di2015NewLine            Array.Clear(_buffer, 0, _buffer.Length); // Destroy any old references so they can be GCed.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Add an element to the buffer, overwriting the oldest element if the buffer is full.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="newItem">The element to add.</param>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Add(T newItem)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _buffer[_back] = newItem;Di2015NewLine            _back = nextSlot(_back);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_back == _front) // Buffer is full?Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _front = nextSlot(_front); // Bump the front, overwriting the current front.Di2015NewLine                _buffer[_back] = default(T); // Remove the old front value.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The typesafe enumerator. Elements are returned in oldest to newest order.Di2015NewLine        /// This is not threadsafe, so if you are enumerating the buffer while another thread is changing it you will runDi2015NewLine        /// into threading problems. Therefore you must use your own locking scheme to avoid the problem.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = _front; i != _back; i = nextSlot(i))Di2015NewLine                yield return _buffer[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>The non-typesafe enumerator.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return GetEnumerator(); // Implement in terms of the typesafe enumerator.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Calculates the index of the slot following the specified one, wrapping if necessary.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int nextSlot(int slot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (slot + 1) % _buffer.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The index of the element at the front of the buffer. Di2015NewLine        /// If this equals _back, the buffer is empty.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int _front;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The index of the first element BEYOND the last used element of the buffer. Di2015NewLine        /// Therefore this indicates where the next added element will go.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int _back;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>The underlying buffer. This has a length one greater than the actual capacity.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly T[] _buffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private void run()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CircularBuffer<int> buffer = new CircularBuffer<int>(10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 20; ++i)Di2015NewLine                buffer.Add(i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (int n in buffer)Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(n);  // Prints 10..19Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Program().run();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20078291Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct YearWeekDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Regex parseRegex =Di2015NewLine                            new Regex(@"^(?<year>\\d{4})-W?(?<week>\\d{2})$");Di2015NewLine    public int Year { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Week { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public YearWeek(int year, int week) : this()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Year = year;Di2015NewLine        this.Week = week;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool TryParse(string s, out YearWeek result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var match = parseRegex.Match(s);Di2015NewLine        if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = new YearWeek(int.Parse(match.Groups["year"].Value),Di2015NewLine                                int.Parse(match.Groups["week"].Value));Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = default(YearWeek);Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static YearWeek Parse(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        YearWeek result;Di2015NewLine        if (TryParse(s, out result))Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("s");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0:0000}-W{1:00}", Year, Week);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20080959Di2015UniqueSeparator  public void RunTest(Action action, String name, Int32 iterations)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      var sw = new System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine      System.GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine      System.GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      sw.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for(var i = 0; i<iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          action();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Console.Write("Name: {0},", name);Di2015NewLine      Console.Write(" Iterations: {1},", iterations);Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(" Milliseconds: {2}", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

20081273Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string json = @"Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ""key1"" : ""value1"",Di2015NewLine            ""key2"" : ""value2"",Di2015NewLine            ""int"" : 5,Di2015NewLine            ""bool"" : true,Di2015NewLine            ""decimal"" : 3.14,Di2015NewLine            ""punct"" : ""x+y=z""Di2015NewLine        }";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var dict = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Dictionary<string, string>>(json);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> kvp in dict)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(kvp.Key) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(kvp.Value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (sb.Length > 0) sb.Append('&');Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(HttpUtility.UrlEncode(kvp.Key));Di2015NewLine                sb.Append('=');Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(HttpUtility.UrlEncode(kvp.Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20083669Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PalyndromeGeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<string> _results;Di2015NewLine    private bool _isGenerated;Di2015NewLine    private int _length;Di2015NewLine    private char[] _characters;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int _middle;Di2015NewLine    private char[] _currentItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PalyndromeGenerator(int length, params char[] characters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (length <= 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("length");Di2015NewLine        if (characters == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("characters");Di2015NewLine        if (characters.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("characters");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _length = length;Di2015NewLine        _characters = characters;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<string> ResultsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_isGenerated)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _results.ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Generate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _middle = (int)Math.Ceiling(_length / 2.0) - 1;Di2015NewLine        _results = new List<string>((int)Math.Pow(_characters.Length, _middle + 1));Di2015NewLine        _currentItem = new char[_length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GeneratePosition(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _isGenerated = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GeneratePosition(int position)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(position == _middle)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < _characters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _currentItem[position] = _characters[i];Di2015NewLine                _currentItem[_length - position - 1] = _characters[i];Di2015NewLine                _results.Add(new string(_currentItem));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for(int i = 0; i < _characters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _currentItem[position] = _characters[i];Di2015NewLine                _currentItem[_length - position - 1] = _characters[i];Di2015NewLine                GeneratePosition(position + 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20092524Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Foo()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write("4");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected internal static void Baz()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // I don't do anything but am called in inherited classes' Di2015NewLine        // constructors to call the Foo constructorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Bar : FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Bar()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Foo.Baz();Di2015NewLine        Console.Write("2");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void DoSomething()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /*...*/Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20092613Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create massive fileDi2015NewLine        var random = new Random();Di2015NewLine        const int lineCount = 32000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var file = File.CreateText("BigFile.txt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < lineCount ; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            file.WriteLine("{0}",i.ToString("D10"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        file.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int sizeOfRecord = 12;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var loadedLines = File.ReadAllBytes("BigFile.txt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ShuffleByteArray(loadedLines, lineCount, sizeOfRecord);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        File.WriteAllBytes("BigFile2.txt", loadedLines);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ShuffleByteArray(byte[] byteArray, int lineCount, int sizeOfRecord)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var temp = new byte[sizeOfRecord];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = lineCount - 1; i > 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int j = random.Next(0, i + 1);Di2015NewLine            // copy i to tempDi2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(byteArray, sizeOfRecord * i, temp, 0, sizeOfRecord);Di2015NewLine            // copy j to iDi2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(byteArray, sizeOfRecord * j, byteArray, sizeOfRecord * i, sizeOfRecord);Di2015NewLine            // copy temp to jDi2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(temp, 0, byteArray, sizeOfRecord * j, sizeOfRecord);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20092658Di2015UniqueSeparator public class ProcessAsUserDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("advapi32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern static extern bool DuplicateTokenEx(Di2015NewLine            IntPtr hExistingToken,Di2015NewLine            uint dwDesiredAccess,Di2015NewLine            ref SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES DesiredAccess,Di2015NewLine            ref IntPtr TokenHandle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("userenv.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern bool bInherit);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("userenv.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern bool DestroyEnvironmentBlock(Di2015NewLine                IntPtr lpEnvironment);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern bool CloseHandle(Di2015NewLine            IntPtr hObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private const short SW_SHOW = 5;Di2015NewLine        private const uint TOKEN_QUERY = 0x0008;Di2015NewLine        private const uint TOKEN_DUPLICATE = 0x0002;Di2015NewLine        private const uint TOKEN_ASSIGN_PRIMARY = 0x0001;Di2015NewLine        private const int GENERIC_ALL_ACCESS = 0x10000000;Di2015NewLine        private const int STARTF_USESHOWWINDOW = 0x00000001;Di2015NewLine        private const int STARTF_FORCEONFEEDBACK = 0x00000040;Di2015NewLine        private const uint CREATE_UNICODE_ENVIRONMENT = 0x00000400;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool LaunchProcessAsUser(string cmdLine, IntPtr token, IntPtr envBlock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool result = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PROCESS_INFORMATION pi = new PROCESS_INFORMATION();Di2015NewLine            SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES saProcess = new SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES();Di2015NewLine            SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES saThread = new SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES();Di2015NewLine            saProcess.nLength = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(saProcess);Di2015NewLine            saThread.nLength = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(saThread);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            STARTUPINFO si = new STARTUPINFO();Di2015NewLine            si.cb = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(si);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //if this member is NULL, the new process inherits the desktopDi2015NewLine            //and window station of its parent process. If this member isDi2015NewLine            //an empty string, the process does not inherit the desktop andDi2015NewLine            //window station of its parent process; instead, the systemDi2015NewLine            //determines if a new desktop and window station need to be created.Di2015NewLine            //If the impersonated user already has a desktop, the system uses theDi2015NewLine            //existing desktop.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            si.lpDesktop = @"WinSta0\\Default"; //Modify as neededDi2015NewLine            si.dwFlags = STARTF_USESHOWWINDOW | STARTF_FORCEONFEEDBACK;Di2015NewLine            si.wShowWindow = SW_SHOW;Di2015NewLine            //Set other si properties as required.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result = CreateProcessAsUser(Di2015NewLine                token,Di2015NewLine                null,Di2015NewLine                cmdLine,Di2015NewLine                ref saProcess,Di2015NewLine                ref saThread,Di2015NewLine                false,Di2015NewLine                CREATE_UNICODE_ENVIRONMENT,Di2015NewLine                envBlock,Di2015NewLine                null,Di2015NewLine                ref si,Di2015NewLine                out pi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (result == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int error = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine                string message = String.Format("CreateProcessAsUser Error: {0}", error);Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IntPtr GetPrimaryToken(int processId)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IntPtr token = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr primaryToken = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            bool retVal = false;Di2015NewLine            Process p = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                p = Process.GetProcessById(processId);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            catch (ArgumentException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string details = String.Format("ProcessID {0} Not Available", processId);Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(details);Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Gets impersonation tokenDi2015NewLine            retVal = OpenProcessToken(p.Handle, TOKEN_DUPLICATE, ref token);Di2015NewLine            if (retVal == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES sa = new SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES();Di2015NewLine                sa.nLength = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(sa);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Convert the impersonation token into Primary tokenDi2015NewLine                retVal = DuplicateTokenEx(Di2015NewLine                    token,Di2015NewLine                    TOKEN_ASSIGN_PRIMARY | TOKEN_DUPLICATE | TOKEN_QUERY,Di2015NewLine                    ref sa,Di2015NewLine                    (int)SECURITY_IMPERSONATION_LEVEL.SecurityIdentification,Di2015NewLine                    (int)TOKEN_TYPE.TokenPrimary,Di2015NewLine                    ref primaryToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Close the Token that was previously opened.Di2015NewLine                CloseHandle(token);Di2015NewLine                if (retVal == false)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string message = String.Format("DuplicateTokenEx Error: {0}", Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                    Debug.WriteLine(message);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string message = String.Format("OpenProcessToken Error: {0}", Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //We'll Close this token after it is used.Di2015NewLine            return primaryToken;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IntPtr GetEnvironmentBlock(IntPtr token)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IntPtr envBlock = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            bool retVal = CreateEnvironmentBlock(ref envBlock, token, false);Di2015NewLine            if (retVal == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Environment Block, things like common paths to My Documents etc.Di2015NewLine                //Will not be created if "false"Di2015NewLine                //It should not adversley affect CreateProcessAsUser.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string message = String.Format("CreateEnvironmentBlock Error: {0}", Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return envBlock;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool Launch(string appCmdLine /*,int processId*/)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool ret = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Either specify the processID explicitlyDi2015NewLine            //Or try to get it from a process owned by the user.Di2015NewLine            //In this case assuming there is only one explorer.exeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Process[] ps = Process.GetProcessesByName("explorer");Di2015NewLine            int processId = -1;//=processIdDi2015NewLine            if (ps.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                processId = ps[0].Id;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (processId > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IntPtr token = GetPrimaryToken(processId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (token != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    IntPtr envBlock = GetEnvironmentBlock(token);Di2015NewLine                    ret = LaunchProcessAsUser(appCmdLine, token, envBlock);Di2015NewLine                    if (envBlock != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                        DestroyEnvironmentBlock(envBlock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    CloseHandle(token);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return ret;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TypeAttribute(Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _type = t;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BaseClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var aName = new AssemblyName("MyAssembly");Di2015NewLine        var ab = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine                aName, AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave);Di2015NewLine        var mb = ab.DefineDynamicModule(aName.Name, aName.Name + ".dll");Di2015NewLine        var tb = mb.DefineType("MyType", TypeAttributes.Public, typeof(BaseClass));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var propertyName = "MyProperty";Di2015NewLine        var propertyType = typeof(int);Di2015NewLine        var propertyBuilder = tb.DefineProperty(propertyName,Di2015NewLine           PropertyAttributes.HasDefault, propertyType, null);Di2015NewLine        var classCtorInfo = typeof(TypeAttribute).Di2015NewLine                   GetConstructor(new Type[] { typeof(Type) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type tArg = typeof(float);        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<PropertyInfo> result = target.GetType()Di2015NewLine          .GetProperties()Di2015NewLine          .Where(Di2015NewLine             p =>Di2015NewLine                p.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(TypeAttribute), true)Di2015NewLine                 //.Where(ca => ((TypeAttribute)ca).)Di2015NewLine                .Any()Di2015NewLine             ).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20104015Di2015UniqueSeparator// Thread.BeginThreadAffinity();Di2015NewLine// GCHandle? notifyHandle = null;Di2015NewLinevar hSCM  = OpenSCManager(null, null, (uint)0xF003F);Di2015NewLineif (hSCM != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StatusChangedCallbackDelegate changeDelegate = ReceivedStatusChangedEvent;Di2015NewLine    var notifyHandle = default(GCHandle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var hService  = OpenService(hSCM, serviceName, (uint)0xF003F);Di2015NewLine    if (hService != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLine        notifyHandle = GCHandle.Alloc(notify, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine        var addr = notifyHandle.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLine        Thread.BeginThreadAffinity();Di2015NewLine        NotifyServiceStatusChange(hService, (uint)0x00000001, addr);Di2015NewLine        SleepEx(timeout, true);Di2015NewLine        Thread.EndThreadAffinity();Di2015NewLine        CloseServiceHandle(hService);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    GC.KeepAlive(changeDelegate);Di2015NewLine    if (notifyHandle != default(GCHandle))Di2015NewLine        notifyHandle.Free();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    CloseServiceHandle(hSCM);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20105267Di2015UniqueSeparator// Type aliases used for brevityDi2015NewLineusing Accessor = System.Func<object, object>;Di2015NewLineusing E = System.Linq.Expressions.Expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal static class AttributeHelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const BindingFlags DeclaredFlags = BindingFlags.Instance |Di2015NewLine                                               BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine                                               BindingFlags.NonPublic |Di2015NewLine                                               BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const BindingFlags InheritedFlags = BindingFlags.Instance |Di2015NewLine                                                BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine                                                BindingFlags.NonPublic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly Accessor NullCallback = _ => null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ThreadStatic]Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Type, Dictionary<Type, Accessor>> _cache;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Type, Accessor> GetCache<TAttribute>()Di2015NewLine        where TAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_cache == null)Di2015NewLine            _cache = new Dictionary<Type, Dictionary<Type, Accessor>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dictionary<Type, Accessor> cache;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_cache.TryGetValue(typeof(TAttribute), out cache))Di2015NewLine            return cache;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cache = new Dictionary<Type, Accessor>();Di2015NewLine        _cache[typeof(TAttribute)] = cache;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return cache;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object MemberWithAttribute<TAttribute>(this object target)Di2015NewLine        where TAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (target == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var accessor = GetAccessor<TAttribute>(target.GetType());Di2015NewLine        if (accessor != null)Di2015NewLine            return accessor(target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Accessor GetAccessor<TAttribute>(Type targetType)Di2015NewLine        where TAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Accessor accessor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var cache = GetCache<TAttribute>();Di2015NewLine        if (cache.TryGetValue(targetType, out accessor))Di2015NewLine            return accessor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var member = FindMember<TAttribute>(targetType);Di2015NewLine        if (member == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cache[targetType] = NullCallback;Di2015NewLine            return NullCallback;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var targetParameter = E.Parameter(typeof(object), "target");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var accessorExpression = E.Lambda<Accessor>(Di2015NewLine            E.Convert(Di2015NewLine                E.MakeMemberAccess(Di2015NewLine                    E.Convert(targetParameter, targetType),Di2015NewLine                    member),Di2015NewLine                typeof(object)),Di2015NewLine            targetParameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        accessor = accessorExpression.Compile();Di2015NewLine        cache[targetType] = accessor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return accessor;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static MemberInfo FindMember<TAttribute>(Type targetType)Di2015NewLine        where TAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in targetType.GetProperties(DeclaredFlags))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attribute = property.GetCustomAttribute<TAttribute>();Di2015NewLine            if (attribute != null)Di2015NewLine                return property;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var field in targetType.GetFields(DeclaredFlags))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attribute = field.GetCustomAttribute<TAttribute>();Di2015NewLine            if (attribute != null)Di2015NewLine                return field;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in targetType.GetProperties(InheritedFlags))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attribute = property.GetCustomAttribute<TAttribute>();Di2015NewLine            if (attribute != null)Di2015NewLine                return property;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var field in targetType.GetFields(InheritedFlags))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attribute = field.GetCustomAttribute<TAttribute>();Di2015NewLine            if (attribute != null)Di2015NewLine                return field;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20107316Di2015UniqueSeparator//The Rectangle (corresponds to the PictureBox.ClientRectangle)Di2015NewLine//we use here is the Form.ClientRectangleDi2015NewLine//Here is the Paint event handler of your Form1Di2015NewLineprivate void Form1_Paint(object sender, EventArgs e){Di2015NewLine  ZoomDrawImage(e.Graphics, yourImage, ClientRectangle);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//use this method to draw the image like as the zooming feature of PictureBoxDi2015NewLineprivate void ZoomDrawImage(Graphics g, Image img, Rectangle bounds){Di2015NewLine  decimal r1 = (decimal) img.Width/img.Height;Di2015NewLine  decimal r2 = (decimal) bounds.Width/bounds.Height;Di2015NewLine  int w = bounds.Width;Di2015NewLine  int h = bounds.Height;Di2015NewLine  if(r1 > r2){Di2015NewLine    w = bounds.Width;Di2015NewLine    h = (int) (w / r1);Di2015NewLine  } else if(r1 < r2){Di2015NewLine    h = bounds.Height;Di2015NewLine    w = (int) (r1 * h);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  int x = (bounds.Width - w)/2;Di2015NewLine  int y = (bounds.Height - h)/2;Di2015NewLine  g.DrawImage(img, new Rectangle(x,y,w,h));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20108116Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class GenericComparer<T> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public enum SortOrderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Ascending = 0,Di2015NewLine        Descending = 1Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string sortColumn;Di2015NewLine    private SortOrder sortingOrder;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string SortColumnDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.sortColumn;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SortOrder SortingOrderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.sortingOrder;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GenericComparer(string theSortColumn, SortOrder theSortingOrder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.sortColumn = theSortColumn;Di2015NewLine        this.sortingOrder = theSortingOrder;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo thePropertyInfo = typeof(T).GetProperty(this.sortColumn);Di2015NewLine        IComparable object1 = (IComparable)thePropertyInfo.GetValue(x, null);Di2015NewLine        IComparable object2 = (IComparable)thePropertyInfo.GetValue(y, null);Di2015NewLine        if (this.sortingOrder == SortOrder.Ascending)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return object1.CompareTo(object2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return object2.CompareTo(object1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20108396Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MyNamespace.UtilitiesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        public class StateObject{Di2015NewLine            public Socket workSocket = null;Di2015NewLine            public const int BUFFER_SIZE = 1024;Di2015NewLine            public byte[] buffer = new byte[BUFFER_SIZE];Di2015NewLine            //public StringBuilder message = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public class FullDuplexSocket : IDisposableDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public event NewMessageHandler OnMessageReceived;Di2015NewLine            public delegate void NewMessageHandler(string Message);Di2015NewLine            public event DisconnectHandler OnDisconnect;Di2015NewLine            public delegate void DisconnectHandler(string Reason);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private Socket _socket;Di2015NewLine            private bool _useASCII = true;Di2015NewLine            private string _remoteServerIp = "";Di2015NewLine            private int _port = 0;Di2015NewLine            private bool _allowRetry = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Constructer of a full duplex client socket.   The consumer should immedately define Di2015NewLine            /// and event handler for the OnMessageReceived event after construction has completed.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="RemoteServerIp">The remote Ip address of the server.</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="Port">The port that will used to transfer/receive messages to/from the remote IP.</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="UseASCII">The character type to encode/decode messages.  Defaulted to use ASCII, but setting the value to false will encode/decode messages in UNICODE.</param>Di2015NewLine            public FullDuplexSocket(string RemoteServerIp, int Port, bool UseASCII = true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _useASCII = UseASCII;Di2015NewLine                _remoteServerIp = RemoteServerIp;Di2015NewLine                _port = Port;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Initialize();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private void Initialize()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                try //to create the socket and connectDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _socket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLine                    _socket.Connect(_remoteServerIp, _port);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Unable to connect to the remote Ip.", e);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                try //to listen to the socketDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    StateObject stateObject = new StateObject();Di2015NewLine                    stateObject.workSocket = _socket;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    _socket.BeginReceiveDi2015NewLine                        (Di2015NewLine                            stateObject.buffer, //Buffer to load in our state objectDi2015NewLine                            0, //Start at the first position in the byte arrayDi2015NewLine                            StateObject.BUFFER_SIZE, //only load up to the max per readDi2015NewLine                            0, //Set socket flags here if necessary Di2015NewLine                            new AsyncCallback(ReadFromSocket), //Who to call when data arrivesDi2015NewLine                            stateObject //state object to use when data arrivesDi2015NewLine                        );Di2015NewLine                    _allowRetry = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Unable to start listening to the socket.", e);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// This will read the bytes from the socket, convert the bytes to a string and fire the OnMessageReceived event.Di2015NewLine            /// If the socket is forcibly closed, the OnDisconnect event will be fired.   This happens when the other side ofDi2015NewLine            /// the socket connection on the remote Ip is no longer available.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="asyncResult"></param>Di2015NewLine            public void ReadFromSocket(IAsyncResult asyncResult)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StateObject stateObject = (StateObject)asyncResult.AsyncState; //pull out the state objectDi2015NewLine                int bytesReceived = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                try //to receive the message.Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytesReceived = stateObject.workSocket.EndReceive(asyncResult); Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception e)  //Exception will occur if connection was forcibly closed.Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    RaiseOnDisconnect(e.Message);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (bytesReceived > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    RaiseOnMessageReceivedDi2015NewLine                        (Di2015NewLine                            _useASCII ?Di2015NewLine                                Encoding.ASCII.GetString(stateObject.buffer, 0, bytesReceived) :Di2015NewLine                                Encoding.Unicode.GetString(stateObject.buffer, 0, bytesReceived)Di2015NewLine                        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    try  //The BeginRecieve can file due to network issues.   _allowRetry allows a single failure between successful connections.Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (_allowRetry)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            stateObject.workSocket.BeginReceiveDi2015NewLine                                (Di2015NewLine                                    stateObject.buffer, //Buffer to load in our state objectDi2015NewLine                                    0, //Start at the first position in the byte arrayDi2015NewLine                                    StateObject.BUFFER_SIZE, //only load up to the max per readDi2015NewLine                                    0, //Set socket flags here if necessary Di2015NewLine                                    new AsyncCallback(ReadFromSocket), //Who to call when data arrivesDi2015NewLine                                    stateObject //state object to use when data arrivesDi2015NewLine                                );Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catchDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        _allowRetry = false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    stateObject.workSocket.Close();Di2015NewLine                    RaiseOnDisconnect("Socket closed normally.");Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Broadcast a message to the IP/Port.  Consumer should handle any exceptions thrown by the socket.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="Message">The message to be sent will be encoded using the character set defined during construction.</param>Di2015NewLine            public void Send(string Message)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //all messages are terminated with /r/nDi2015NewLine                Message += Environment.NewLine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                byte[] bytesToSend = _useASCII ?Di2015NewLine                    Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Message) :Di2015NewLine                    Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(Message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int bytesSent = _socket.Send(bytesToSend);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Clean up the socket.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            void IDisposable.Dispose()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _socket.Close();Di2015NewLine                    RaiseOnDisconnect("Socket closed via Dispose method.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch { }Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _socket.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch { }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// This method will gracefully raise any delegated events if they exist.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="Message"></param>Di2015NewLine            private void RaiseOnMessageReceived(string Message)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                try //to raise delegatesDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    OnMessageReceived(Message);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch { } //when none exist ignore the Object Reference ErrorDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// This method will gracefully raise any delegated events if they exist.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="Message"></param>Di2015NewLine            private void RaiseOnDisconnect(string Message)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                try //to raise delegatesDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    OnDisconnect(Message);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch { } //when none exist ignore the Object Reference ErrorDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20111513Di2015UniqueSeparatorUnwrapAngle()
20111513Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object UnwrapAngle(double angle) {Di2015NewLine        if (angle >= 0) {Di2015NewLine            var tempAngle = angle % 360;Di2015NewLine            return tempAngle == 360 ? 0 : tempAngle;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return 360 - (-1 * angle) % 360;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void TestUnwrap(double angle, double expected) {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(String.Format("{0} unwrapped = {1}, expected {2}", angle, UnwrapAngle(angle), expected));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        TestUnwrap(0, 0);Di2015NewLine        TestUnwrap(360, 0);Di2015NewLine        TestUnwrap(180, 180);Di2015NewLine        TestUnwrap(360 + 180, 180);Di2015NewLine        TestUnwrap(-270, 90);Di2015NewLine        TestUnwrap(-270 - 720, 90);Di2015NewLine        TestUnwrap(-725, 355);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20114013Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DataContainerConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (objectType == typeof(DataContainer));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        JObject jo = JObject.Load(reader);Di2015NewLine        DataContainer container = new DataContainer();Di2015NewLine        container.ID = jo["id"].Value<int>();Di2015NewLine        container.Data = jo["attr"]["info"]["dat"].ToObject<List<Dat>>(serializer);Di2015NewLine        return container;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataContainer container = (DataContainer)value;Di2015NewLine        JObject jo = new JObject();Di2015NewLine        jo.Add("id", container.ID);Di2015NewLine        JObject attr = new JObject();Di2015NewLine        jo.Add("attr", attr);Di2015NewLine        JObject info = new JObject();Di2015NewLine        attr.Add("info", info);Di2015NewLine        JArray dat = JArray.FromObject(container.Data, serializer);Di2015NewLine        info.Add("dat", dat);Di2015NewLine        jo.WriteTo(writer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20117685Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring i_clob1 = "anything1 </";Di2015NewLinestring i_clob2 = "anything2 </";Di2015NewLinestring i_clob3 = "anything3 </";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring allTogether = i_clob1 + i_clob2 + i_clob3;Di2015NewLineint start2 = i_clob1.Length;Di2015NewLineint length2 = i_clob2.Length;Di2015NewLineint start3 = start2 + length2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring[] bitsToAvoid = new string[] { "</", "<", ">"};Di2015NewLinestring i_clob1_out = i_clob1;Di2015NewLineforeach (string bit in bitsToAvoid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (i_clob1_out.Substring(i_clob1_out.Length - bit.Length) == bit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        start2 = start2 - bit.Length;Di2015NewLine        length2 = length2 + bit.Length;Di2015NewLine        i_clob1_out = allTogether.Substring(0, start2);Di2015NewLine        break; //Just one wrong bit is assumed to be presentDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestring i_clob2_out = allTogether.Substring(start2, length2);Di2015NewLineforeach (string bit in bitsToAvoid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (i_clob2_out.Substring(i_clob2_out.Length - bit.Length) == bit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        start3 = start3 - bit.Length;Di2015NewLine        i_clob2_out = allTogether.Substring(start2, start3 - start2);Di2015NewLine        break; //Just one wrong bit is assumed to be presentDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestring i_clob3_out = allTogether.Substring(start3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinei_clob1 = i_clob1_out; //"anything1 "Di2015NewLinei_clob2 = i_clob2_out; //"</anything2" Di2015NewLinei_clob3 = i_clob3_out; //"</anything3 </" Di2015NewLine

20122334Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[,] array2D = new int[,]Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                { 1, 2 }, Di2015NewLine                { -3, 4 }, Di2015NewLine                { 5, -6 }, Di2015NewLine                { -7, -8 }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        var max = GetMaxMatrix(array2D);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(max);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int GetMaxMatrix(int[,] original)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int maxArea = int.MinValue; Di2015NewLine        int rowCount = original.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        int columnCount = original.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine        int[,] matrix = PrecomputeMatrix(original);Di2015NewLine        for (int row1 = 0; row1 < rowCount; row1++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int row2 = row1; row2 < rowCount; row2++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int col1 = 0; col1 < columnCount; col1++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int col2 = col1; col2 < columnCount; col2++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        maxArea = Math.Max(maxArea, ComputeSum(matrix, row1, row2, col1, col2));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return maxArea;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int[,] PrecomputeMatrix(int[,] matrix)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sumMatrix = new int[matrix.GetLength(0), matrix.GetLength(1)];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < matrix.GetLength(0); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < matrix.GetLength(1); j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (i == 0 && j == 0)Di2015NewLine                { // first cellDi2015NewLine                    sumMatrix[i, j] = matrix[i, j];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (j == 0)Di2015NewLine                { // cell in first columnDi2015NewLine                    sumMatrix[i, j] = sumMatrix[i - 1, j] + matrix[i, j];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (i == 0)Di2015NewLine                { // cell in first rowDi2015NewLine                    sumMatrix[i, j] = sumMatrix[i, j - 1] + matrix[i, j];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sumMatrix[i, j] = sumMatrix[i - 1, j] +Di2015NewLine                    sumMatrix[i, j - 1] - sumMatrix[i - 1, j - 1] + matrix[i, j];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sumMatrix;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int ComputeSum(int[,] sumMatrix, int i1, int i2, int j1, int j2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (i1 == 0 && j1 == 0)Di2015NewLine        { // starts at row 0, column 0Di2015NewLine            return sumMatrix[i2, j2];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (i1 == 0)Di2015NewLine        { // start at row 0Di2015NewLine            return sumMatrix[i2, j2] - sumMatrix[i2, j1 - 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (j1 == 0)Di2015NewLine        { // start at column 0Di2015NewLine            return sumMatrix[i2, j2] - sumMatrix[i1 - 1, j2];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return sumMatrix[i2, j2] - sumMatrix[i2, j1 - 1]Di2015NewLine            - sumMatrix[i1 - 1, j2] + sumMatrix[i1 - 1, j1 - 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20122859Di2015UniqueSeparator    private IDisposable HandleAddRemove<T>(Di2015NewLine        ObservableCollection<T> collection,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, Task> addActionAsync,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, Task> removeActionAsync)Di2015NewLine
20122859Di2015UniqueSeparatorObservableCollection<T>
20122859Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<Func<T, Task>> GetAddRemoveLoop<T>(Di2015NewLine    Func<T, Task> addFunc,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, Task> removeFunc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return addFunc;Di2015NewLine        yield return removeFunc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20122859Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IDisposable HandleAddRemove<T>(Di2015NewLine    ObservableCollection<T> collection,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, Task> addActionAsync,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, Task> removeActionAsync)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ObservableDi2015NewLine        .FromEventPattern<NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs>(Di2015NewLine            h => collection.CollectionChanged += h,Di2015NewLine            h => collection.CollectionChanged -= h)Di2015NewLine        .Select(evt => evt.EventArgs)Di2015NewLine        .Where(item => item.Action == NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add ||Di2015NewLine                        item.Action == NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove)Di2015NewLine        .Select(x => x.Action == NotifyCollectionChangedAction.AddDi2015NewLine                            ? (T) x.NewItems[0]Di2015NewLine                            : (T) x.OldItems[0])Di2015NewLine        .GroupBy(item => item)Di2015NewLine        .SelectMany(item => item.Zip(Di2015NewLine            GetAddRemoveLoop(addActionAsync, removeActionAsync),Di2015NewLine            (i, action) => Observable.Defer(() => action(i).ToObservable())).Concat())Di2015NewLine        .Subscribe();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20122859Di2015UniqueSeparatorCollectionChanged
20122859Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IDisposable HandleAddRemove<T>(Di2015NewLine    ObservableCollection<T> collection,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, Task> addActionAsync,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, Task> removeActionAsync)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ObservableDi2015NewLine        .FromEventPattern<NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs>(Di2015NewLine            h => collection.CollectionChanged += h,Di2015NewLine            h => collection.CollectionChanged -= h)Di2015NewLine        .Select(evt => evt.EventArgs)Di2015NewLine        .Where(item => item.Action == NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add ||Di2015NewLine                        item.Action == NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove)Di2015NewLine        .Select(x => x.Action == NotifyCollectionChangedAction.AddDi2015NewLine                            ? (T) x.NewItems[0]Di2015NewLine                            : (T) x.OldItems[0])Di2015NewLine        .GroupBy(item => item)Di2015NewLine        .SelectMany(item => item.Zip(Di2015NewLine            GetAddRemoveLoop(addActionAsync, removeActionAsync),Di2015NewLine            (i, action) => Observable.Defer(() => action(i).ToObservable())).Concat())Di2015NewLine        .Subscribe();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20122859Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar collection = new ObservableCollection<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunc<string, Task> addAction = x =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Begin add task for " + x);Di2015NewLine        return Task.Delay(2000)Di2015NewLine                .ContinueWith(t => Console.WriteLine("End add task for " + x));Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunc<string, Task> removeAction = x =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Begin remove task for " + x);Di2015NewLine    return Task.Delay(3000)Di2015NewLine            .ContinueWith(t => Console.WriteLine("End remove task for " + x));Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar sub = HandleAddRemove(Di2015NewLine    collection,Di2015NewLine    addAction,Di2015NewLine    removeAction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinecollection.Add("item1");Di2015NewLineThread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLinecollection.Remove("item1");Di2015NewLineThread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLinecollection.Add("item2");Di2015NewLinecollection.Add("item3");Di2015NewLineThread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLinecollection.Remove("item3");Di2015NewLineThread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLinecollection.Remove("item2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineThread.Sleep(30000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinesub.Dispose();Di2015NewLine

20129233Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupWhile<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<T> list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(iterator.Current))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return list;Di2015NewLine                list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20129628Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string[,] GetData(int row, int column, string filePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[,] data = new string[row, column];Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader reader = File.OpenText(filePath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int r = 0; r < data.GetLength(0); r++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int c = 0; c < data.GetLength(1); c++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (reader.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return data;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Note that Parse throw error if the string is not a valid intDi2015NewLine                    //use it only if you anticipate that your file contain int only and otherDi2015NewLine                    //string should be considered as errors. otherwise use TryParseDi2015NewLine                    data[r, c] = int.Parse(reader.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
